title: Marshawn Lynch's Future and Defensive Back Prospects With Dane Brugler (Ep. 97)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Danny Kelly discuss the Marshawn Lynch saga and what it means to Seahawks fans (02:00). Then Dane Brugler of CBS Sports joins the show to discuss top safety prospects Jamal Adams and Malik Hooker (15:00), where Jabrill Peppers fits in the NFL (25:00), and some of the highest-rated cornerbacks entering the draft (36:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
